headline: Oppenheimer Reaffirms DexCom Buy Rating Amid HHS Wearables Push
summary: DexCom, Inc. (NASDAQ:DXCM) ranks among the best fundamental stocks to buy according to hedge funds. Oppenheimer reaffirmed its $95 price target and Outperform rating for DexCom, Inc. (NASDAQ:DXCM) on June 24 in response to remarks made by Health and Human Services Secretary RFK Jr. regarding a significant wearables campaign. At a June 24 hearing of […]
